anns.postfix: is able to potently inhibit A. thaliana growth in an agar-based assay (Fig. 2a, and Supplementary Fig. 5).

anns.prefix: To explore the potential of

anns.postfix: into a commercial glufosinate formulation known as Finale® at a final AA concentration of 250 μM27,28.

anns.prefix: We then sprayed
anns.postfix: solution onto glufosinate resistant A. thaliana.
alone had no observable inhibitory effects on plant growth, but adding AA severely inhibited plant growth (Extended Data Fig. 7).
